labels.name: P4, unlikely to ever be fixed.

data.expected_result: A blue highlight should overshadow the text written `like this`, as it does with normal text
data.short_description: Unable to highlight text in single backtick codeblocks with S pen.
data.steps_to_repro: - type a message `in this format` (optional: leave some normal text next to it) - copy the text with your S pen
